About Me

A few things about me...

BIO

From a very young age I was interested in tech, all I had to play with was radios, cars etc then progressed to computers and programming and here I am today. I love my family and my city of Auckland in Aotearoa(NZ).

My other love is programming and have a passion for learning new things and ideas. I would like nothing better than to get your online business or app up and running.

Here's a little run down of what I can do for you...

The Engineer

Full Stack Developer

I have worked with current technologies such as the latest versions of Javascript, React with Redux, Handlebars, Python along with HTML on the front-end and node.js with express and SQLite, MongoDB etc on the back-end.

Flutter is my go-to for mobile which covers IOS and Android in one convenient language package.

The Designer

Front End Developer

The part the customer sees begins with but is not limited to technologies such as HTML 5, CSS 3, SASS and Styled components to name a few but you can begin to imagine that you can build exquisite things of beauty on the screen. For mobile Flutter with material UI and cuppertino add-ons cover the UI duties for both Android and IOS respectively.

The Imagineer

Designer

A digital designer is the culmination of a good eye and natural artistic qualities which involve imagination and technologies, sometimes pushing the envelope a bit until it becomes a work of digital art.
